text: Ann Robinson (born May 25, 1929) is an American actress and stunt horse rider. She is best known for her work in the science-fiction classic The War of the Worlds and in the 1954 movie Dragnet. Robinson was born in Hollywood, California.Ann Robinson Film Reference bio She studied at Hollywood High School. In 1987, she married Joseph Valdez. They divorced in 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Ann Robinson interview, thespectrum.com; accessed August 10, 2016.
